YukiTaTypeScript Lavalink Toolkit

Core, protocol, gateway, connectors and plugins with strict Result-based API.

Quick Start
Plugin Guide

Multi-node Core

Runtime node add/remove, health checks, reconnect with backoff+jitter, and failover with playback consistency.

Predictable API

Public methods return Result with stable error codes and structured metadata.

Gateway + Plugins

WebSocket control/event bridge, role-aware auth, and extension points without monkey patching.

Monorepo ​

This repository uses pnpm workspaces and ships each package independently to npm.
